GetEmbeddingsAsync(String, Model, Nullable<Int32>)

Ask the API to embed text DefaultEmbeddingModel

Declaration
Task<float[]> GetEmbeddingsAsync(string input, Model model = null, int? dimensions = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.String input

Text to be embedded
Model model

The model to use. You can use GetModelsAsync() to see all of your available models, or use a standard model like AdaTextEmbedding.
System.Nullable<System.Int32> dimensions

The number of dimensions the resulting output embeddings should have. Only supported in text-embedding-3 and later models.
Returns
Type Description
System.Threading.Tasks.Task<System.Single[]>

Asynchronously returns the first embedding result as an array of floats.
